snippet.quote: sa tathā viṣayairvilobhyamānaḥ paramārhairapi śākyarājasūnuḥ 5.1 saḥ tathā viṣayaiḥ|vilobhyamānaḥ parama|arhaiḥ|api śākya|rāja|sūnuḥ 5.1 na jagāma dhṛtiṃ na śarma lebhe hṛdaye siṃha ivātidigdhaviddhaḥ 5.1 na jagāma dhṛtim na śarma lebhe hṛdaye siṃhaḥ iva|ati|digdha|viddhaḥ 5.1

atha mantrisutaiḥ kṣamaiḥ kadācitsakhibhiścitrakathaiḥ kṛtānuyātraḥ 5.2 atha mantri|sutaiḥ kṣamaiḥ kadācit|sakhibhiḥ|citra|kathaiḥ kṛta|anuyātraḥ 5.2 vanabhūmididṛkṣayā śamepsurnaradevānumato bahiḥ pratasthe 5.2 vana|bhūmi|didṛkṣayā śama|īpsuḥ|naradeva|anumataḥ bahis pratasthe 5.2

navarukmakhalīnakiṅkiṇīkaṃ pracalaccāmaracāruhemabhāṇḍam 5.3 nava|rukma|khalīna|kiṅkiṇīkam pracalat|cāmara|cāru|hema|bhāṇḍam 5.3 abhiruhya sa kanthakaṃ sadaśvaṃ prayayau ketumiva drumābjaketuḥ 5.3 abhiruhya saḥ kanthakam sat|aśvam prayayau ketum|iva druma|abja|ketuḥ 5.3

sa vikṛṣṭatarāṃ vanāntabhūmiṃ vanalobhācca yayau mahīguṇācca 5.4 saḥ vikṛṣṭatarām vanānta|bhūmim vana|lobhāt|ca yayau mahī|guṇāt|ca 5.4 salilormivikārasīramārgāṃ vasudhāṃ caiva dadarśa kṛṣyamāṇām 5.4 salila|ūrmi|vikāra|sīra|mārgām vasudhām ca|eva dadarśa kṛṣyamāṇām 5.4

halabhinnavikīrṇaśaṣpadarbhāṃ hatasūkṣmakrimikīṭajantukīrṇām 5.5 hala|bhinna|vikīrṇa|śaṣpa|darbhām hata|sūkṣma|krimi|kīṭa|jantu|kīrṇām 5.5 samavekṣya rasāṃ tathāvidhāṃ tāṃ svajanasyeva vadhe bhṛśaṃ śuśoca 5.5 samavekṣya rasām tathāvidhām tām sva|janasya|iva vadhe bhṛśam śuśoca 5.5

kṛṣataḥ puruṣāṃśca vīkṣamāṇaḥ pavanārkāṃśurajovibhinnavarṇān 5.6 kṛṣataḥ puruṣān|ca vīkṣamāṇaḥ pavana|arka|aṃśu|rajas|vibhinna|varṇān 5.6 vahanaklamaviklavāṃśca dhuryān paramāryaḥ paramāṃ kṛpāṃ cakāra 5.6 vahana|klama|viklavān|ca dhuryān parama|āryaḥ paramām kṛpām cakāra 5.6

avatīrya tatasturaṅgapṛṣṭhācchanakairgāṃ vyacaracchucā parītaḥ 5.7 avatīrya tatas|turaṃga|pṛṣṭhāt|śanakais|gām vyacarat|śucā parītaḥ 5.7 jagato jananavyayaṃ vicinvan kṛpaṇaṃ khalvidamityuvāca cārtaḥ 5.7 jagantaḥ janana|vyayam vicinvan kṛpaṇam khalu|idam|iti|uvāca ca|ārtaḥ 5.7

manasā ca viviktatāmabhīpsuḥ suhṛdastānanuyāyino nivārya 5.8 manasā ca viviktatām|abhīpsuḥ suhṛdaḥ|tān|anuyāyinaḥ nivārya 5.8 abhitaścalacāruparṇavatyā vijane mūlamupeyivān sa jambvāḥ 5.8 abhitas|cala|cāru|parṇavatyāḥ vijane mūlam|upeyivān saḥ jambvāḥ 5.8

tags.label: gems and precious metals (jewels and ornaments)

snippet.quote: niṣasāda sa yatra śaucavatyāṃ bhuvi vaidūryanikāśaśādvalāyām 5.9 niṣasāda saḥ yatra śaucavatyām bhuvi vaiḍūrya|nikāśa|śādvalāyām 5.9 jagataḥ prabhavavyayau vicinvanmanasaśca sthitimārgamālalambe 5.9 jagataḥ prabhava|vyayau vicinvan|manasaḥ|ca sthiti|mārgam|ālalambe 5.9

samavāptamanaḥsthitiśca sadyo viṣayecchādibhirādhibhiśca muktaḥ 5.10 samavāpta|manas|sthitiḥ|ca sadyas viṣaya|icchā|ādibhiḥ|ādhibhiḥ|ca muktaḥ 5.10 savitarkavicāramāpa śāntaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam anāsravaprakāram 5.10 sa|vitarka|vicāram|āpa śāntam prathamam dhyānam anāsrava|prakāram 5.10

adhigamya tato vivekajaṃ tu paramaprītisukhaṃ manaḥsamādhim 5.11 adhigamya tatas viveka|jam tu parama|prīti|sukham manas|samādhim 5.11 idameva tataḥ paraṃ pradadhyau manasā lokagatiṃ niśāmya samyak 5.11 idam|eva tatas param pradadhyau manasā loka|gatim niśāmya samyak 5.11

kṛpaṇaṃ bata yajjanaḥ svayaṃ sannavaśo vyādhijarāvināśadharmā 5.12 kṛpaṇam bata yat|janaḥ svayam san|avaśaḥ vyādhi|jarā|vināśa|dharmā 5.12 jarayārditamāturaṃ mṛtaṃ vā paramajño vijugupsate madāndhaḥ 5.12 jarayā|arditam|āturam mṛtam vā param|ajñaḥ vijugupsate mada|andhaḥ 5.12

iha cedahamīdṛśaḥ svayaṃ san vijugupseya paraṃ tathāsvabhāvam 5.13 iha ced|aham|īdṛśaḥ svayam san vijugupseya param tathā|svabhāvam 5.13 na bhavetsadṛśaṃ hi tatkṣamaṃ vā paramaṃ dharmamimaṃ vijānato me 5.13 na bhavet|sadṛśam hi tat|kṣamam vā paramam dharmam|imam vijānataḥ me 5.13

iti tasya vipaśyato yathāvajjagato vyādhijarāvipattidoṣān 5.14 iti tasya vipaśyataḥ yathāvat|jagantaḥ vyādhi|jarā|vipatti|doṣān 5.14 balayauvanajīvitapravṛtto vijagāmātmagato madaḥ kṣaṇena 5.14 bala|yauvana|jīvita|pravṛttaḥ vijagāma|ātma|gataḥ madaḥ kṣaṇena 5.14

na jaharṣa na cāpi cānutepe vicikitsāṃ na yayau na tandrinidre 5.15 na jaharṣa na ca|api ca|anutepe vicikitsām na yayau na tandri|nidre 5.15 na ca kāmaguṇeṣu saṃrarañje na vididveṣa paraṃ na cāvamene 5.15 na ca kāma|guṇeṣu saṃrarañje na vididveṣa param na ca|avamene 5.15

iti buddhiriyaṃ ca nīrajaskā vavṛdhe tasya mahātmano viśuddhā 5.16 iti buddhiḥ|iyam ca nīrajaskā vavṛdhe tasya mahātmanaḥ viśuddhā 5.16 puruṣairaparairadṛśyamānaḥ puruṣaścopasasarpa bhikṣuveṣaḥ 5.16 puruṣaiḥ|aparaiḥ|adṛśyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ|ca|upasasarpa bhikṣu|veṣaḥ 5.16

naradevasutastamabhyapṛcchadvada ko 'sīti śaśaṃsa so 'tha tasmai 5.17 naradeva|sutaḥ|tam|abhyapṛcchat|vada kaḥ asi|iti śaśaṃsa saḥ atha tasmai 5.17 narapuṃgava janmamṛtyubhītaḥ śramaṇaḥ pravrajito 'smi mokṣahetoḥ 5.17 nara|puṃgava janma|mṛtyu|bhītaḥ śramaṇaḥ pravrajitaḥ asmi mokṣa|hetoḥ 5.17

jagati kṣayadharmake mumukṣurmṛgaye 'haṃ śivamakṣayaṃ padaṃ tat 5.18 jagati kṣaya|dharmake mumukṣuḥ|mṛgaye aham śivam|akṣayam padam tat 5.18 svajane 'nyajane ca tulyabuddhirviṣayebhyo vinivṛttarāgadoṣaḥ 5.18 sva|jane anya|jane ca tulya|buddhiḥ|viṣayebhyaḥ vinivṛtta|rāga|doṣaḥ 5.18

nivasan kvacideva vṛkṣamūle vijane vāyatane girau vane vā 5.19 nivasan kvacit|eva vṛkṣa|mūle vijane vā|āyatane girau vane vā 5.19 vicarāmyaparigraho nirāśaḥ paramārthāya yathopapannabhaikṣaḥ 5.19 vicarāmi|aparigrahaḥ nirāśaḥ paramārthāya yathā|upapanna|bhaikṣaḥ 5.19

snippet.quote: sacivaistu nidarśito yathāvad bahumānātpraṇayācca śāstrapūrvam 5.40 sacivaiḥ|tu nidarśitaḥ yathāvat bahu|mānāt|praṇayāt|ca śāstra|pūrvam 5.40 guruṇā ca nivārito 'śrupātaiḥ praviveśāvasathaṃ tataḥ sa śocan 5.40 guruṇā ca nivāritaḥ aśru|pātaiḥ praviveśa|āvasatham tatas saḥ śocan 5.40

tags.label: the bodhisattva watching sleeping women  (the great renunciation)

snippet.quote: calakuṇḍalacumbitānanābhirghananiśvāsavikampitastanībhiḥ 5.41 cala|kuṇḍala|cumbita|ānanābhiḥ|ghana|niśvāsa|vikampita|stanībhiḥ 5.41 vanitābhir adhīralocanābhir mṛgaśāvābhir ivābhyudīkṣyamāṇaḥ 5.41 vanitābhiḥ adhīra|locanābhiḥ mṛga|śāvābhiḥ iva|abhyudīkṣyamāṇaḥ 5.41

tags.label: the bodhisattva watching sleeping women  (the great renunciation)

snippet.quote: sa hi kāñcanaparvatāvadāto hṛdayonmādakaro varāṅganānām 5.42 saḥ hi kāñcana|parvata|avadātaḥ hṛdaya|unmāda|karaḥ vara|aṅganānām 5.42 śravaṇāṅgavilocanātmabhāvānvacanasparśavapurguṇairjahāra 5.42 śravaṇa|aṅga|vilocana|ātma|bhāvān|vacana|sparśa|vapuḥ|guṇaiḥ|jahāra 5.42

tags.label: the bodhisattva watching sleeping women  (the great renunciation)

snippet.quote: vigate divase tato vimānaṃ vapuṣā sūrya iva pradīpyamānaḥ 5.43 vigate divase tatas vimānam vapuṣā sūryaḥ iva pradīpyamānaḥ 5.43 timiraṃ vijighāṃsurātmabhāsā ravirudyanniva merumāruroha 5.43 timiram vijighāṃsuḥ|ātma|bhāsā raviḥ|udyan|iva merum|āruroha 5.43

kanakojjvaladīptadīpavṛkṣaṃ varakālāgurudhūpapūrṇagarbham 5.44 kanaka|ujjvala|dīpta|dīpavṛkṣam vara|kālāguru|dhūpa|pūrṇa|garbham 5.44 adhiruhya sa vajrabhakticitraṃ pravaraṃ kāñcanamāsanaṃ siṣeve 5.44 adhiruhya saḥ vajra|bhakti|citram pravaram kāñcanam|āsanam siṣeve 5.44
tata uttamamuttamāṅganāstaṃ niśi tūryairupatasthurindrakalpam 5.45 tatas uttamam|uttama|aṅganāḥ|tam niśi tūryaiḥ|upatasthuḥ|indra|kalpam 5.45
himavacchirasīva candragaure draviṇendrātmajamapsarogaṇaughāḥ 5.45 himavat|śirasi|iva candra|gaure draviṇa|indra|ātmajam|apsaras|gaṇa|oghāḥ 5.45

paramairapi divyatūryakalpaiḥ sa tu tairnaiva ratiṃ yayau na harṣam 5.46 paramaiḥ|api divya|tūrya|kalpaiḥ saḥ tu taiḥ|na|eva ratim yayau na harṣam 5.46 paramārthasukhāya tasya sādhor abhiniścikramiṣā yato na reme 5.46 parama|artha|sukhāya tasya sādhoḥ abhiniścikramiṣā yatas na reme 5.46

atha tatra suraistapovariṣṭhairakaniṣṭhairvyavasāyamasya buddhvā 5.47 atha tatra suraiḥ|tapas|variṣṭhaiḥ|akaniṣṭhaiḥ|vyavasāyam|asya buddhvā 5.47 yugapatpramadājanasya nidrā vihitāsīdvikṛtāśca gātraceṣṭāḥ 5.47 yugapad|pramadā|janasya nidrā vihitā|āsīt|vikṛtāḥ|ca gātra|ceṣṭāḥ 5.47

abhavacchayitā hi tatra kācidviniveśya pracale kare kapolam 5.48 abhavat|śayitā hi tatra kācit|viniveśya pracale kare kapolam 5.48 dayitāmapi rukmapattracitrāṃ kupitevāṅkagatāṃ vihāya vīṇām 5.48 dayitām|api rukma|pattra|citrām kupitā|iva|aṅka|gatām vihāya vīṇām 5.48

vibabhau karalagnaveṇuranyā stanavisrastasitāṃśukā śayānā 5.49 vibabhau kara|lagna|veṇuḥ|anyā stana|visrasta|sita|aṃśukā śayānā 5.49 ṛjuṣaṭpadapaṅktijuṣṭapadmā jalaphenaprahasattaṭā nadīva 5.49 ṛju|ṣaṭpada|paṅkti|juṣṭa|padmā jala|phena|prahasat|taṭā nadī|iva 5.49

navapuṣkaragarbhakomalābhyāṃ tapanīyojjvalasaṃgatāṅgadābhyām 5.50 nava|puṣkara|garbha|komalābhyām tapanīya|ujjvala|saṃgata|aṅgadābhyām 5.50 svapiti sma tathāparā bhujābhyāṃ parirabhya priyavanmṛdaṅgameva 5.50 svapiti sma tathā|aparā bhujābhyām parirabhya priya|vat|mṛdaṅgam|eva 5.50

navahāṭakabhūṣaṇāstathānyā vasanaṃ pītamanuttamaṃ vasānāḥ 5.51 nava|hāṭaka|bhūṣaṇāḥ|tathā|anyāḥ vasanam pītam|anuttamam vasānāḥ 5.51 avaśā ghananidrayā nipeturgajabhagnā iva karṇikāraśākhāḥ 5.51 avaśāḥ ghana|nidrayā nipetuḥ|gaja|bhagnāḥ iva karṇikāra|śākhāḥ 5.51

avalambya gavākṣapārśvamanyā śayitā cāpavibhugnagātrayaṣṭiḥ 5.52 avalambya gavākṣa|pārśvam|anyā śayitā cāpa|vibhugna|gātra|yaṣṭiḥ 5.52 virarāja vilambicāruhārā racitā toraṇaśālabhañjikeva 5.52 virarāja vilambi|cāru|hārā racitā toraṇa|śālabhañjikā|iva 5.52

tags.label: city gate/building architraved door of western type

snippet.quote: maṇikuṇḍaladaṣṭapattralekhaṃ mukhapadmaṃ vinataṃ tathāparasyāḥ 5.53 maṇi|kuṇḍala|daṣṭa|pattra|lekham mukha|padmam vinatam tathā|aparasyāḥ 5.53 śatapattram ivārdhavakranāḍaṃ sthitakāraṇḍavaghaṭṭitaṃ 5.53 śatapattram iva ardha|vakra|nāḍaṃ sthita|kāraṇḍava|ghaṭṭitam cakāśe 5.53

aparāḥ śayitā yathopaviṣṭāḥ stanabhārair avanamyamānagātrāḥ 5.54 aparāḥ śayitāḥ yathā|upaviṣṭāḥ stana|bhāraiḥ avanamyamāna|gātrāḥ 5.54 upaguhya parasparaṃ virejurbhujapāśaistapanīyaparihāryaiḥ 5.54 upaguhya parasparam virejuḥ|bhuja|pāśaiḥ|tapanīya|parihāryaiḥ 5.54

mahatīṃ parivādinīṃ ca kācidvanitāliṅgya sakhīmiva prasuptā 5.55 mahatīm parivādinīm ca kācit|vanitā|āliṅgya sakhīm|iva prasuptā 5.55 vijughūrṇa calatsuvarṇasūtrā vadanenākulayoktrakeṇa 5.55 vijughūrṇa calat|suvarṇa|sūtrā vadanena|ākula|yoktrakeṇa 5.55

paṇavaṃ yuvatirbhujāṃsadeśād avavisraṃsitacārupāśam anyā 5.56 paṇavam yuvatiḥ|bhuja|aṃsa|deśāt avavisraṃsita|cāru|pāśam anyā 5.56 savilāsaratāntatāntam ūrvor vivare kāntamivābhinīya śiśye 5.56 sa|vilāsarata|anta|tāntam ūruvoḥ vivare kāntam|iva|abhinīya śiśye 5.56

aparā na babhūvurnimīlitākṣyo vipulākṣyo 'pi śubhabhruvo 'pi satyaḥ 5.57 aparāḥ na babhūvuḥ|nimīlita|akṣyaḥ vipula|akṣyaḥ api śubha|bhrū api satyaḥ 5.57 pratisaṃkucitāravindakośāḥ savitaryastamite yathā nalinyaḥ 5.57 pratisaṃkucita|aravinda|kośāḥ savitri|astam|ite yathā nalinyaḥ 5.57

śithilākulamūrdhajā tathānyā jaghanasrastavibhūṣaṇāṃśukāntā 5.58 śithila|ākula|mūrdhajā tathā|anyā jaghana|srasta|vibhūṣaṇa|aṃśu-kāntā 5.58 aśayiṣṭa vikīrṇakaṇṭhasūtrā gajabhagnā pratiyātanāṅganeva 5.58 aśayiṣṭa vikīrṇa|kaṇṭha|sūtrā gaja|bhagnā pratiyātanā|aṅganā|iva 5.58

aparāstvavaśā hriyā viyuktā dhṛtimatyo 'pi vapurguṇairupetāḥ 5.59 aparāḥ|tu|avaśāḥ hriyā viyuktāḥ dhṛtimatyaḥ api vapus|guṇaiḥ|upetāḥ 5.59 viniśaśvasurulbaṇaṃ śayānā vikṛtāḥ kṣiptabhūjā jajṛmbhire ca 5.59 viniśaśvasuḥ|ulbaṇam śayānāḥ vikṛtāḥ kṣipta|bhūjāḥ jajṛmbhire ca 5.59

vyapaviddhavibhūṣaṇasrajo 'nyā visṛtāgranthanavāsaso visaṃjñāḥ 5.60 vyapaviddha|vibhūṣaṇa|srajaḥ anyāḥ visṛta|āgranthana|vāsasaḥ visaṃjñāḥ 5.60 animīlitaśuklaniścalākṣyo na virejuḥ śayitā gatāsukalpāḥ 5.60 animīlita|śukla|niścala|akṣyaḥ na virejuḥ śayitāḥ gatāsu|kalpāḥ 5.60

vivṛtāsyapuṭā vivṛddhagātrī prapatadvaktrajalā prakāśaguhyā 5.61 vivṛta|āsya|puṭā vivṛddha|gātrī prapatat|vaktra|jalā prakāśa|guhyā 5.61 aparā madaghūrṇiteva śiśye na babhāse vikṛtaṃ vapuḥ pupoṣa 5.61 aparā mada|ghūrṇitā|iva śiśye na babhāse vikṛtam vapuḥ pupoṣa 5.61

iti sattvakulānvayānurūpaṃ vividhaṃ sa pramadājanaḥ śayānaḥ 5.62 iti sattva|kula|anvaya|anurūpam vividham saḥ pramadā|janaḥ śayānaḥ 5.62 sarasaḥ sadṛśaṃ babhāra rūpaṃ pavanāvarjitarugnapuṣkarasya 5.62 sarasaḥ sadṛśaṃ babhāra rūpaṃ pavana|āvarjita|rugna|puṣkarasya 5.62

samavekṣya tathā tathā śayānā vikṛtāstā yuvatīradhīraceṣṭāḥ 5.63 samavekṣya tathā tathā śayānāḥ vikṛtāḥ|tāḥ yuvatīḥ|adhīra|ceṣṭāḥ 5.63 guṇavadvapuṣo 'pi valgubhāṣā nṛpasūnuḥ sa vigarhayāṃbabhūva 5.63 Guṇavat|vapuṣaḥ api valgu|bhāṣāḥ nṛpa|sūnuḥ saḥ vigarhayāṃbabhūva 5.63

aśucirvikṛtaśca jīvaloke vanitānāmayamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ 5.64 aśuciḥ|vikṛtaḥ|ca jīva|loke vanitānām|ayam|īdṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ 5.64 vasanābharaṇaistu vañcyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ strīviṣayeṣu rāgameti 5.64 vasana|ābharaṇaiḥ|tu vañcyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ strī|viṣayeṣu rāgam|eti 5.64

vimṛśedyadi yoṣitāṃ manuṣyaḥ prakṛtiṃ svapnavikāramīdṛśaṃ ca 5.65 vimṛśet|yadi yoṣitām manuṣyaḥ prakṛtim svapna|vikāram|īdṛśam ca 5.65 dhruvamatra na vardhayetpramādaṃ guṇasaṃkalpahatastu rāgameti 5.65 dhruvam|atra na vardhayet|pramādam guṇa|saṃkalpa|hataḥ|tu rāgam|eti 5.65

iti tasya tadantaraṃ viditvā niśi niścikramiṣā samudbabhūva 5.66 iti tasya tat|antaram viditvā niśi niścikramiṣā samudbabhūva 5.66 avagamya manastato 'sya devairbhavanadvāramapāvṛtaṃ babhūva 5.66 avagamya manaḥ|tatas asya devaiḥ|bhavana|dvāram|apāvṛtam babhūva 5.66

atha so 'vatatāra harmyapṛṣṭhādyuvatīstāḥ śayitā vigarhamāṇaḥ 5.67 atha saḥ avatatāra harmya|pṛṣṭhāt|yuvatīḥ|tāḥ śayitāḥ vigarhamāṇaḥ 5.67 avatīrya tataśca nirviśaṅko gṛhakakṣyāṃ prathamāṃ vinirjagāma 5.67 avatīrya tatas|ca nirviśaṅkaḥ gṛha|kakṣyām prathamām vinirjagāma 5.67

turagāvacaraṃ sa bodhayitvā javinaṃ chandakamitthamityuvāca 5.68 turaga|avacaram saḥ bodhayitvā javinam chandakam|ittham|iti|uvāca 5.68 hayamānaya kanthakaṃ tvarāvānamṛtaṃ prāptumito 'dya me yiyāsā 5.68 hayam|ānaya kanthakam tvarāvān|amṛtam prāptum|itas adya mama yiyāsā 5.68

hṛdi yā mama tuṣṭiradya jātā vyavasāyaśca yathā matau niviṣṭaḥ 5.69 hṛdi yā mama tuṣṭiḥ|adya jātā vyavasāyaḥ|ca yathā matau niviṣṭaḥ 5.69 vijane 'pi ca nāthavānivāsmi dhruvamartho 'bhimukhaḥ sameta iṣṭaḥ 5.69 vijane api ca nāthavān|iva|asmi dhruvam|arthaḥ abhimukhaḥ sametaḥ iṣṭaḥ 5.69

hriyameva ca saṃnatiṃ ca hitvā śayitā matpramukhe yathā yuvatyaḥ 5.70 hriyam|eva ca saṃnatim ca hitvā śayitāḥ mad|pramukhe yathā yuvatyaḥ 5.70 vivṛte ca yathā svayaṃ kapāṭe niyataṃ yātumato mamādya kālaḥ 5.70 vivṛte ca yathā svayam kapāṭe niyatam yātum|atas mama|adya kālaḥ 5.70

pratigṛhya tataḥ sa bharturājñāṃ viditārtho 'pi narendraśāsanasya 5.71 pratigṛhya tatas saḥ bhartuḥ|ājñām vidita|arthaḥ api narendra|śāsanasya 5.71 manasīva pareṇa codyamānasturagasyānayane matiṃ cakāra 5.71 manasi|iva pareṇa codyamānaḥ|turagasya|ānayane matim cakāra 5.71

atha hemakhalīnapūrṇavaktraṃ laghuśayyāstaraṇopagūḍhapṛṣṭham 5.72 atha hema|khalīna|pūrṇa|vaktram laghu|śayyā|āstaraṇa|upagūḍha|pṛṣṭham 5.72 balasattvajavānvayopapannaṃ sa varāśvaṃ tamupānināya bhartre 5.72 bala|sattva|java|anvaya|upapannam saḥ vara|aśvam tam|upānināya bhartre 5.72

pratatatrikapucchamūlapārṣṇiṃ nibhṛtahrasvatanūjapucchakarṇam 5.73 pratata|trika|puccha|mūla|pārṣṇim nibhṛta|hrasva|tanūja|puccha|karṇam 5.73 vinatonnatapṛṣṭhakukṣipārśvaṃ vipulaprothalalāṭakaṭyuraskam 5.73 vinata|unnata|pṛṣṭha|kukṣi|pārśvam vipula|protha|lalāṭa|kaṭi|uraskam 5.73

upaguhya sa taṃ viśālavakṣāḥ kamalābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa 5.74 upaguhya saḥ tam viśāla|vakṣāḥ kamala|ābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa 5.74 madhurākṣarayā girā śaśāsa dhvajinīmadhyamiva praveṣṭukāmaḥ 5.74 madhura|akṣarayā girā śaśāsa dhvajinī|madhyam|iva praveṣṭu|kāmaḥ 5.74

bahuśaḥ kila śatravo nirastāḥ samare tvāmadhiruhya pārthivena 5.75 bahuśas kila śatravaḥ nirastāḥ samare tvām|adhiruhya pārthivena 5.75 ahamapyamṛtaṃ padaṃ yathāvatturagaśreṣṭha labheya tatkuruṣva 5.75 aham|api|amṛtam padam yathāvat|turaga|śreṣṭha labheya tat|kuruṣva 5.75

sulabhāḥ khalu saṃyuge sahāyā viṣayāvāptasukhe dhanārjane vā 5.76 sulabhāḥ khalu saṃyuge sahāyāḥ viṣaya|avāpta|sukhe dhana|arjane vā 5.76 puruṣasya tu durlabhāḥ sahāyāḥ patitasyāpadi dharmasaṃśraye vā 5.76 puruṣasya tu durlabhāḥ sahāyāḥ patitasya|āpadi dharma|saṃśraye vā 5.76

iha caiva bhavanti ye sahāyaḥ kaluṣe karmaṇi dharmasaṃśraye vā 5.77 iha ca|eva bhavanti ye sahāyaḥ kaluṣe karmaṇi dharma|saṃśraye vā 5.77 avagacchati me yathāntarātmā niyataṃ te 'pi janāstadaṃśabhājaḥ 5.77 avagacchati me yathā|antarātmā niyatam te api janāḥ|tad|aṃśa|bhājaḥ 5.77

tadidaṃ parigamya dharmayuktaṃ mama niryāṇamito jagaddhitāya 5.78 tat|idam parigamya dharma|yuktam mama niryāṇam|itas jagat|hitāya 5.78 turagottama vegavikramābhyāṃ prayatasvātmahite jagaddhite ca 5.78 turaga|uttama vega|vikramābhyām prayatasva|ātma|hite jagat|hite ca 5.78

iti suhṛdamivānuśiṣya kṛtye turagavaraṃ nṛvaro vanaṃ yiyāsuḥ 5.79 iti suhṛdam|iva|anuśiṣya kṛtye turaga|varam nṛvaraḥ vanam yiyāsuḥ 5.79 sitamasitagatidyutirvapuṣmān raviriva śāradamabhramāruroha 5.79 sitam|asita|gati|dyutiḥ|vapuṣmān raviḥ|iva śāradam|abhram|āruroha 5.79

atha sa pariharanniśīthacaṇḍaṃ parijanabodhakaraṃ dhvaniṃ sadaśvaḥ 5.80 atha saḥ pariharat|niśītha|caṇḍam parijana|bodha|karam dhvanim sat|aśvaḥ 5.80 vigatahanuravaḥ praśāntaheṣaścakitavimuktapadakramo jagāma 5.80 vigata|hanu|ravaḥ praśānta|heṣaḥ|cakita|vimukta|pada|kramaḥ jagāma 5.80

kanakavalayabhūṣitaprakoṣṭhaiḥ kamalanibhaiḥ kamalāniva pravidhya 5.81 kanaka|valaya|bhūṣita|prakoṣṭhaiḥ kamala|nibhaiḥ kamalān|iva pravidhya 5.81 avanatatanavastato 'sya yakṣāścakitagatair dadhire khurān karāgraiḥ 5.81 avanata|tanavaḥ|tatas asya yakṣāḥ|cakita|gataiḥ dadhire khurān kara|agraiḥ 5.81

guruparighakapāṭasaṃvṛtā yā na sukhamapi dviradair apāvriyante 5.82 guru|parigha|kapāṭa|saṃvṛtāḥ yāḥ na sukham|api dviradaiḥ apāvriyante 5.82 vrajati nṛpasute gatasvanāstāḥ svayamabhavanvivṛtāḥ puraḥ pratolyaḥ 5.82 vrajati nṛpa|sute gata|svanāḥ|tāḥ svayam|abhavan|vivṛtāḥ puraḥ|pratolyaḥ 5.82

pitaramabhimukhaṃ sutaṃ ca bālaṃ janamanuraktamanuttamāṃ ca lakṣmīm 5.83 pitaram|abhimukham sutam ca bālam janam|anuraktam|anuttamām ca lakṣmīm 5.83 kṛtamatirapahāya nirvyapekṣaḥ pitṛnagarātsa tato vinirjagāma 5.83 kṛtamatiḥ|apahāya nirvyapekṣaḥ pitṛ|nagarāt|saḥ tatas vinirjagāma 5.83

atha sa vimalapaṅkajāyatākṣaḥ puramavalokya nanāda siṃhanādam 5.84 atha saḥ vimala|paṅkaja|āyata|akṣaḥ puram|avalokya nanāda siṃhanādam 5.84 jananamaraṇayoradṛṣṭapāro na puramahaṃ kapilāhvayaṃ praveṣṭā 5.84 janana|maraṇayoḥ|adṛṣṭa|pāraḥ na puram|aham kapila|āhvayam praveṣṭā 5.84

iti vacanamidaṃ niśamya tasya draviṇapateḥ pariṣadgaṇā nananduḥ 5.85 iti vacanam|idam niśamya tasya draviṇa|pateḥ pariṣad|gaṇāḥ nananduḥ 5.85 pramuditamanasaśca devasaṅghā vyavasitapāraṇamāśaśaṃsire 'smai 5.85 pramudita|manasaḥ|ca deva|saṃghāḥ vyavasita|pāraṇam|āśaśaṃsire asmai 5.85

hutavahavapuṣoḥ divaukaso 'nye vyavasitamasya suduṣkaraṃ viditvā 5.86 hutavaha|vapuṣaḥ divaukasaḥ anye vyavasitam|asya su|duṣkaram viditvā 5.86 tuhine pathi prakāśaṃ ghanavivaraprasṛtā ivendupādāḥ 5.86 tuhine pathini prakāśam ghana|vivara|prasṛtāḥ iva|indu|pādāḥ 5.86

harituragaturaṅgavatturaṅgaḥ sa tu vicaranmanasīva codyamānaḥ 5.87 hari|turaga|turaṃga|vat|turaṃgaḥ saḥ tu vicaran|manasi|iva codyamānaḥ 5.87 aruṇaparuṣatāram antarikṣaṃ sa ca subahūni jagāma yojanāni 5.87 aruṇa|paruṣa|tāram antarikṣam saḥ ca su|bahūni jagāma yojanāni 5.87
